original_title: Zinc-Air, The Next Contender In Vehicle Batteries?
original_content:
If youve got an interest in technology, its inevitable that your feed will feature a constant supply of stories with titles in the vein of New battery breakthrough offers unlimited life and capacity!. If we had a pound, dollar, or Euro for each one, wed be millionaires by now. But while the real science behind the breathless headlines will undoubtedly have provided incremental battery improvements, were still waiting for the unlimited battery.
Its not to say that they dont conceal some interesting stories though, and theres an announcement from Australia proving this point admirably. Scientists at ECU in Perth have created a new cathode compound for rechargeable zinc-air batteries, which it is hoped will make them much safer and cheaper competitors for lithium-ion cells.
Most of us think of zinc-air batteries as the tiny cells youd put in a camera or a hearing aid, but these conceal a chemistry with significant potential that is held back by the difficulty of creating a reliable cathode. In these batteries the cathode is a porous support in which a reaction between zinc powder wet paste and oxygen in the air occurs, turning zinc into zinc oxide and releasing electrons which can be harvested as electricity. They have a very high power density, but previous cathode materials have quickly degraded performance when presented with significant load.
The new cathode support is a nano-composite material containing cobalt, nickel, and iron, and is claimed to offer much better performance without the degradation. Whether or not it can be mass-produced remains to be seen, but as a possible alternative to lithium-ion in portable and transport applications its of great interest.
title: 耐久性と容量が向上する新しい亜鉛空気電池の開発
body: オーストラリアの研究者が、亜鉛空気電池の新たな正極化合物を開発しました。これにより、リチウムイオン電池と比べて安全性とコストの面で競争力を持つことが期待されています。亜鉛空気電池は、亜鉛粉末と空気中の酸素との反応によって電気を発生させますが、従来の正極材料は負荷が大きいと性能が低下していました。新しい正極材料は、コバルト、ニッケル、鉄を含むナノコンポジットで、劣化せずに高性能を発揮するとされています。これは、携帯電子機器や交通機関のリチウムイオン電池の代替として興味深いものです。
titles: 耐久性と容量が向上する新しい亜鉛空気電池の開発
リチウムイオン電池に対する安全性と低コストの競争相手、亜鉛空気電池の新しい発見
亜鉛空気電池の新しいカソード材料が性能を向上させる
高いパワー密度を持つ亜鉛空気電池におけるカソード材料の革新
携帯電子機器や交通機関におけるリチウムイオン電池の代替として期待される亜鉛空気電池の可能性
